metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000017 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4 and 4.6 are vulnerable to a weakness where a user with appropriate permissions is able to connect to an arbitrary MySQL server

notes.Note: sbeattie> The vulnerability is exposed only to MySQL superusers.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
